name: .JOY File Extension
summary: Learn about .JOY files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Settings file created by Facial Editor, a component of the CryENGINE SDK video game making software; saves a joystick configuration for a joystick that is used to configure facial movements for a game character.

content: NOTE: Joysticks are sometimes used for creating facial expressions rather than creating them programmatically.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
